title: Ticket #3433: Have a template for the body of notification emails
description:
(This is a request from Dimitri at BMRB.)

He'd like to be able to specify (at the job level) some kind of a template for the body of the notification email that gets sent for a job. (Basically, he'd like to be able to set things up to send an email directly to a user who is implicitly running Condor via a web interface, and who doesn't know anything about cluster IDs, etc.)
